website_summaries.verdict: Nike unleashes the React Element 55 SE to beef out its main model’s wide-ranging colorways and styles. This special edition packs a set of twists—new color concepts, grid-textured and rugged-vibed uppers, and reflective details that glow in the dark. All this adds an interesting depth the Element 55 silhouette.The signature React foam midsole—Nike’s most responsive and lightest material—remains underfoot, delivering an extremely cushioned ride.
pros: The Nike React Element 55 SE strikes the majority of reviewers as both classic and futuristic
Flocks of shoppers are captivated by its standout silhouette and unique, bright color schemes
More than a handful of wearers share about getting compliments from friends and onlookers—both male and female
Various users, whose jobs demand long hours of standing, walking, and even running, remark that the Element 55 SE delivers long-lasting comfort
Plenty of testers—two of them with Achilles tear and neuropathy—are impressed with the React midsole cushioning, which feels pleasantly soft and bouncy underfoot
Some reviewers prefer the React midsole over the Ultraboost and Vapormax
Many users are stunned with its Element 55 SE’s functionality, given that it’s a lifestyle sneaker
The Element 55 SE weighs unbelievably light
Many happy customers consider collecting Element 55 SEs in different colorways
cons: Several customers have pointed out that the tongue is thin and flimsy, and tends to twist, fold, and slip to either side
A few reviewers say that this sneaker’s durability is questionable
The toe box feels too narrow to a couple of wearers, with one comparing its tightness to a soccer cleat

customer_reviews.title: Great looking show...fits small though..
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is undoubtedly aesthetically pleasing to the eye...however, this shoe runs small, narrow and doesn't provide sufficient support. The show material is stretchable. I wear a size 10.5D and have worn a number of Nike shoes...their shoes are quite comfortable...especially for traveling...with this shoe, I found myself unlacing them frequently while traveling...the shoe tongue (I think that's what it is called) hurts the top of my feet...I tried loosing the strings...quick tie button on strings (nice touch)...still felt pressure....for the price...I expected a bit more...I've only worn them once...maybe I need to break them in....but it's gong to be a painful endeavor...
customer_reviews.author: Jazzhess

customer_reviews.title: Might be fake
customer_reviews.text: We are not sure this is a real Nike because we noticed the swoosh does not match the pair my older son has like this pair. Might be a fake which is why the cells popped in just one week while running in a natural course.
customer_reviews.author: buyerk

customer_reviews.title: I'd grab the element 87s instead if I could go back
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable great technology BUT. The issue falls with the breathability. Your feet will sweat like crazy so go ahead and grab some athletes foot cream if you buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Dontae merk

customer_reviews.title: Best Nikes I’ve ever owned (almost)
customer_reviews.text: Mine were a bit tight when I first got them, but stretched gently within 4hrs of use and mounded to my foot. Love them. Hear are the lightest, most comfortable shoes I’ve had in a long time. (My most favs we’re back in the late 70s - first pair ever of low top leather whites with the black swoosh, aww man!)
customer_reviews.author: Toby Lucich

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Nice Sneakers! Runs small, got .5 size bigger to fit as expected. The box was ruined and looked used which was disappointing because it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice light show with ultimate comfort. It's sort of a canvas style sneaker which makes cleaning extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquim Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: RIPPED after light use
customer_reviews.text: The shoes ripped and were horrible quality from the start. Not sure if they are fake but need a refund.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but fits a bit snug. Otherwise, I would purchase again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Samaria McClary

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: After breaking in the first couple days. Really comfortable for running soft heel landing
customer_reviews.author: Basil Nasereldeen

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes.. Material is a little thin so I have to be careful when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice! Runs small. I got .5 a size bigger and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tess
